About BitMash and BFES LLC

BitMash is a free, browser-based media tool that transforms clean, high-quality audio and image files into intentionally low-fidelity, retro-styled versions. Powered by WebAssembly and FFmpeg, every conversion runs locally in your browser. This means no uploads to any servers, and no data ever leaves your device. Originally built to recreate the quirky, compressed audio effects found in old music videos and meme videos, BitMash has grown into a playful toolkit for reducing audio quality, pixelating images, and even combining them into offbeat video creations. It’s a simple, fun way to mangle your media in seconds.

BFES LLC is an independent software company founded in May 2025. Our mission is to create useful, engaging, and accessible digital tools for everyday users. No idea is too silly. While we currently focus on web-based applications, we are excited to expand into new platforms and technologies in the future.

Privacy Policy

Effective Date: July 2, 2025

BFES LLC respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our website and tools.

Information We Collect

We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal data or uploaded files to any server. All file processing happens locally on your device through your web browser using WebAssembly-based tools (specifically FFmpeg.wasm). No files you upload or generate are ever sent over the internet or stored by us.

How Your Files Are Used

Your files remain in your browser’s memory during processing and are deleted once you refresh or leave the page. The processed output is provided directly to you in your browser.

Cookies & Tracking

We do not use cookies, analytics services, or user tracking on this site.

Third-Party Services

Our website does not integrate with any third-party services that collect data.

Security

Since no data is transmitted to a server, risks associated with data storage or transmission are minimized. We recommend using our tools on trusted devices and networks.
